General.Name: Howteh Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Howteh Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the trading and agency business in active and passive components, and equipment in Taiwan, China, and Vietnam. It provides integrated circuit carrier board equipment, chemicals and raw materials, semiconductors, and optical equipment. The company also offers connector, FFC, thunderbolt cable, MEMS, coaxial cable, conversion cables, USB type C, audio amplifier, and LED controller products, as well as power management, radio frequency, and Haptic. It also provides printed circuit boards and optoelectronic equipment. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 25, Dunhua South Road, Taipei, Taiwan
